(&#8220;Maple&#8221;) and Salt Merger Sub, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of DPS (&#8220;Merger Sub&#8221;), whereby Merger Sub would merge with and into Maple, with Maple surviving the merger as a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company (the &#8220;Transaction&#8221;). </font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">Upon consummation of the Transaction, which occurred on July 9, 2018, DPS was renamed Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (&#34;KDP&#34; or the &#34;Company&#34;). KDP continues to operate as a public company traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol &#34;KDP&#34;. KDP now conducts the combined business operations of DPS and Maple, including Keurig Green Mountain, Inc. (&#34;Keurig&#34;).</font></div><div style="text-indent:9pt;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, (&#34;DPS&#34;) entered into an Agreement and Plan of Merger (the &#34;Merger Agreement&#34;) by and among DPS, Maple Parent Holdings Corp. (&#8220;Maple</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">&#8221;) and Salt Merger Sub, Inc. (&#8220;Merger Sub&#8221;), whereby Merger Sub w</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">ould</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;"> be merged with and into Maple</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">, with Maple</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;"> surviving the merger as a wholly-owned subsidiary of DPS (the &#8220;Transaction&#8221;). The Transaction was consummated on July&#160;9, 2018 (the &#34;Merger Date&#34;), at which time DPS changed its name to &#34;Keurig Dr Pepper Inc.&#34;. </font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">Immediately prior to the consummation of the Transaction (the &#8220;Effective Time&#8221;), each share of common stock of Maple </font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;"> issued and outstanding was converted into the right to receive a number of fully paid and non</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">assessable shares of common stock of Merger Sub determined pursuant to an exchange ratio set forth in the Merger Agreement (the &#8220;Acquisition Shares&#8221;). As a result of the Transaction, the stockholders of Maple</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;"> as of immediately prior to the Effective Time own</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">ed</font><font required by law, payable to holders of its common stock as of</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;"> July 6, 2018</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">. </font></div><div information was prepared using the acquisition method of accounting, which requires, among other things, that assets acquired and liabilities assumed in a business combination be recognized at their fair values as of the completion of the acquisition. We utilized estimated fair values at the Merger Date for the preliminary allocation of consideration to the net tangible and intangible assets acquired and liabilities assumed. During the measurement period, we will continue to obtain information to assist in determining the fair value of </font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">net tangible and intangible assets acquired and liabilities assumed</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">, which may differ materially from these preliminary estimates.The historical consolidated financial statements have been adjusted in the accompanying financial information to give effect to unaudited pro forma events that are (1) directly attributable to the transaction, (2) factually supportable, and (3) are expected to have a continuing impact on the results of operations of the combined company.</font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">The financial information has been prepared based upon currently available information and assumptions deemed appropriate by</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">&#160;</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">the Company's management. This financial information is not necessarily indicative of what our results of operations actually would have been had the Transaction been completed as of </font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">December 31, 2016</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">. In addition, the financial information is not indicative of future results or current financial conditions and does not reflect any anticipated synergies, operating efficiencies, cost savings or any integration costs that may result from the Transaction. 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">ompany reports its financial results in accordance with U.S. GAAP. However, management believes that certain non-GAAP financial measures that reflect the way management evaluates the business may provide investors with additional information regarding the company's results, trends and ongoing performance on a comparable basis. Specifically, investors should consider the following with respect to our quarterly results&#58;</font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;font-weight:700;line-height:120%;">Adjusted&#58; </font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">Defined as certain financial statement captions and metrics adjusted for certain items affecting comparability.</font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;font-weight:700;line-height:120%;">Items affecting comparability&#58; </font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">Defined as certain items that are excluded for comparison to prior year periods, adjusted for the tax impact as applicable. Tax impact is determined based upon an approximate rate for each item. For each period, management adjusts for (i) the unrealized mark-to-market impact of derivative instruments not designated as hedges in accordance with U.S. GAAP&#59; (ii) the amortization associated with definite-lived intangible assets&#59; (iii) the amortization of the deferred financing costs associated with the Dr Pepper Snapple Group Merger (&#34;DPSG Merger&#34;) and Keurig Green Mountain, Inc. Acquisition (&#34;Keurig Acquisition&#34;)&#59; (iv) stock compensation expense attributable to the matching awards made to employees who made an initial investment in the Keurig Green Mountain, Inc. Executive Ownership Plan&#59; and (v) other certain items that are excluded for comparison purposes to prior year periods. </font></div><div style="text-indent:18pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:9pt;"><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">T</font><font style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255, 0.0);color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;line-height:120%;">he other certain items excluded for comparison purposes </font><font
